node_mapping.motivation: The article discusses significant interest rate cuts proposed by the Treasury Secretary, which directly relates to the existing Fed Policy node, indicating potential impacts on macroeconomic conditions.

article_node.title: Horizons Middle East & Africa 8/14/2025
article_node.summary: Scott Bessent, the Treasury Secretary, advocates for significant interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve, suggesting a reduction of 50 basis points next month. President Trump warns Russian President Putin of severe consequences if he does not agree to a cease-fire regarding Ukraine. Meanwhile, Tencent's shares rise after the company reports strong earnings, despite a contraction in credit data from the People's Bank of China, indicating cautious consumer sentiment.
